name: NETXP LINUX Kubelet - Kubernetes Kubelet event
description: Monitors the execution of Kubernetes Kubelet (kubelet), providing visibility into Kubernetes-related activities on the system. Detection of Kubelet activities helps in monitoring Kubernetes operations and potential security risks.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "kubelet" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
